53 PX_FOUNDATION_API PxQuat PxShortestRotation(const PxVec3& from, const PxVec3& target);
54 
55 /* \brief diagonalizes a 3x3 symmetric matrix y
56 
57 The returned matrix satisfies M = R * D * R', where R is the rotation matrix for the output quaternion, R' its
58 transpose, and D the diagonal matrix
59 
60 If the matrix is not symmetric, the result is undefined.
61 
62 \param[in] m the matrix to diagonalize
63 \param[out] axes a quaternion rotation which diagonalizes the matrix
64 \return the vector diagonal of the diagonalized matrix.
65 */
66 
67 PX_FOUNDATION_API PxVec3 PxDiagonalize(const PxMat33& m, PxQuat& axes);
68 
69 #if !PX_DOXYGEN
70 } // namespace physx
71 #endif
72 
74 #endif
